Class Solver.Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • Solver.Location

  • public class Solver.Location
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an Object that represents a location in a board It saves a 2D array of Solver.Location Objects for a given board So that we can REFERENCE the objects and instead of created new Solver.Location instances. This Object also supports Solver.Location addition, used to move blocks in the Solver.Block object.
    Author:
    Daniel Van Der Maden
